info.description: API for Meeting Assistant application with OAuth, room management, and LiveKit integration
info.title: Meeting Assistant API

post.description: Manually triggers AI processing (transcription and analysis) for a meeting recording

400.description: Missing recording_url or invalid meeting ID

get.description: Processes the OAuth callback from Google and sets a HttpOnly session cookie. Redirects to frontend callback URL configured in FrontendURL setting.

307.description: Redirect to frontend callback URL with session_id HttpOnly cookie

401.description: Authentication failed - invalid code or state

get.description: Redirects user to Google OAuth consent screen. Returns 307 Temporary Redirect.

307.description: Redirect to Google OAuth consent page

post.description: Invalidates the session and logs out the user. Supports session_id cookie (preferred) or refresh_token in body (backwards compatibility).

parameters.description: Refresh token (optional, only for backwards compatibility)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's information. Supports Authorization header (Bearer) or session cookie.

post.description: Gets a new access token using session_id from HttpOnly cookie. No request body needed.

200.description: Token refreshed successfully with access_token and expires_in

get.description: Gets a paginated list of rooms with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new meeting room with specified settings

get.description: Gets detailed information about a specific room

patch.description: Transfers the host role to another participant (host only)

400.description: Invalid room ID, new host ID, or new host is not a participant

get.description: Gets a list of all participants in a room

post.description: Allows a user to join an existing room and get LiveKit credentials

200.description: Successfully joined room with LiveKit credentials

400.description: Invalid room ID or room is full

delete.description: Allows a user to leave a room they are currently in

get.description: Gets a list of participants waiting for approval in a room (host only)

delete.description: Removes a participant from the room (host/co-host only)

post.description: Admits a waiting participant to join the room (host only)
Denies a waiting participant from joining the room (host only)
Receives webhook events from AssemblyAI when transcription completes
Receives webhook events from LiveKit server

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
